page.title: 06Tourism in Herm, page 2.
page.content: Herm lies three miles east of Guernsey's St. Peter Port, twenty miles west of France and less than a hundred miles south of England. Many holidaymakers visit Herm just for the day from Guernsey, the boat journey takes twenty minutes. Those who want to stay longer have the choice between the White House, Herm's only hotel, self-catering in holiday cottages or camping on the sites provided. The island is regarded as a playground for Guernsey people and many take their summer holidays there.
